portofolio_sumary: I am an Information Systems student at Universitas Muhammadiyah Sumatera Utara (UMSU), entering my final semester. Born and raised in Medan City, my passion for technology and software development shaped the career path I pursued. In the course of my education, I have built a number of key skills. I have proficiency in software development as a frontend developer, as well as basic programming. I have also mastered app development using Flutter.In addition, I have experience in auditing information systems, which gives me great insight into the efficiency and security of business operations.My experience includes a 5-month internship at Kampus Merdeka, where I focused on digitalization. I successfully developed a web application to monitor continuous production and played an important role in the development of RFID technology with web integration. I also gained valuable experience at PT Kalbe Nutritinals Sanghiang Perkasa, an international company that honed my understanding of the demands of the industrial world. One of my significant achievements was designing a web application for effective production monitoring. I also successfully followed the COBIT 5 flow in auditing information systems, demonstrating my commitment to good security and management standards.My career goal is clear: I want to create system interfaces that provide convenience to users and improve work efficiency. More than just programming, I also have a vision to develop high-value products for people.In addition to technical skills, I have strong communication skills. I have led student organizations and brought positive changes. I am comfortable speaking in public and have a planned approach to each presentation. I also have an interest in developing businesses, along with a hobby of playing badminton.My vision is to create convenience and help people's needs through products and innovation. I am ready to face challenges and realize these goals in my career journey.

courses.title: Student
courses.description: Mengikuti kelas Full Courses Flutter With ITBOX

courses.title: Junior Network Engineer
courses.description: I have experienced networking in my own college and also learned many things.

courses.title: Digitalisasi
courses.description: Involved in the creation of RFID tracking dashboard web using C# language, Performed the KeyInDumping web process using C# programming language, java script and CRUD sql server in accordance with the company's OOP, Create document creation processes such as FSD and also document needs in building web dashboard systems and also web KeyInDumping

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.description: Saya membuat clone dari Spotify yang ditugaskan untuk saya dalam keperluan tugas pribadi generasi gigih 2.0. Saya membuat menu login, home, playlist, dan juga menu pencarian artis dan lagu lainnya.

projects.title: NetPus Apps
projects.description: Di sini saya hanya membuat bagian login dan dashboard. Pada halaman login dan registrasi, saya menggunakan Firebase karena Firebase sangat mudah digunakan. Di halaman dashboard dan fitur navigasi, saya buat untuk memudahkan tim dalam membangun bagian-bagian tugas.

projects.title: Desain UX Research - Sepatu Bekas Original
projects.description: Membuat aplikasi sepatu bekas original untuk anak muda adalah konsep produk yang bertujuan untuk menciptakan platform online yang memungkinkan anak muda mencari dan membeli sepatu bekas original dengan lebih mudah dan efisien.

projects.title: Flutter UI - Sepatu Bekas Original Apps
projects.description: Membuat aplikasi sepatu bekas original untuk anak muda adalah konsep produk yang bertujuan untuk menciptakan platform online yang memungkinkan anak muda mencari dan membeli sepatu bekas original dengan lebih mudah dan efisien. Ini aplikasi hanya bagian front end saja, belum ada fungsi yang diberikan.

projects.title: Share Notes Apps (CRUD) With Flutter & Firebase
projects.description: Aplikasi share notes yang dibuat dengan Flutter dan Firebase, memungkinkan pengguna untuk membuat, membaca, memperbarui, dan menghapus catatan mereka. Aplikasi ini juga dilengkapi dengan fitur pencarian dan penanganan koneksi internet.

projects.title: Flutter UI MultiApps Calculator, Calendar & Weather
projects.description: Saya membuat beberapa aplikasi kecil seperti kalkulator, kalender, dan cuaca menggunakan Flutter. Aplikasi ini hanya menggunakan UI Flutter dan mengakses API untuk data cuaca.
